author: Richard Poole
content: I’m very happy to share that I’m starting a new position as Business Development Manager at BRUGG Pipes, producers of advanced piping solutions for Industrial and Muncipal applications.

author: Anthony Preston

content: National Business Development role for a leading product provider based in Auckland! Reach out for further details. #businessdevelopment #wealth #hiring #opportunities

author: Simon Massey
author_info: Chief Client Officer (interim) at Schroders Personal Wealth
content: That’s the end of my current interim assignment leading the advice, support and business development teams at Schroders Personal Wealth.  I’ve really enjoyed the 9 months - and with everyone’s great support we have collectively achieved a lot.  Some impressive numbers  and real momentum in the business and I leave wishing all there continued success.

author: Praveen K
content: Infoblox is looking for: Business Development Representative – Singapore & Philippines

author: Ranjith Mathew
author_info: LinkedIn Influencer | Community Builder | Networker | Career Mentor | IT Recruiter | Brand Management |
content:
Winner!! Winner!! Winner!! 
I am so humbled and thankful to the community of Ottawa at large and to all those who supported me to win the 2022 Faces Magazine Ottawa's People's Choice Award for the Business Development Professional category. As a new immigrant, this is great recognition for me, and no words to thank those who nominated me for this award. As you know my strength is people and my community and I thank each one of you who supported me by voting daily to win this people's choice award. 

Sincerely, Ranjith Mathew
#Winner #FacesMagazineAward
#BusinessDevelopmentProfessional

author: Barbara Chaneton
author_info: Cell and Gene Therapy- Business Development Manager at Thermo Fisher Scientific
content: I’m happy to share that I’m starting a new position as Business Development Manager- Cell and Gene Therapy at Thermo Fisher Scientific! After 4 amazing years as part of the genetic sciences division in Cambridge, I'm thrilled to start a new role in Madrid working across divisions to accelerate the development of cell and gene therapies in Spain, Italy, Portugal and Israel. I look forward to engaging with the vibrant CGT community in Southern Europe to drive forward this exciting field together!  #genetherapy #celltherapy #cgt

author: Mustafa Perçinçek
content: I’m happy to share that I’m starting a new position as Business Development and Programs Manager at Leonardo Türkiye!

author: Kristian Tan
author_info: Hiring the best sales talent to the American Express community.
content:
*** Business Development Opportunities ***  ***  Melbourne *** 

We are currently hiring 2 x exciting opportunities to join our high performing Small Business sales team based in Melbourne.

If you are looking to find a supportive community and a platform for your career with a global brand then American Express is the right move for you. 

I'm looking to speak with energetic, driven candidates with consultative sales experience, ideally B2B, however we will consider B2C. 

Please click on the link below to apply, and find out more, or direct message me for more information. 

Matthew Edwards Sumit Minocha Mark Potter Kristina Demostheni
#TeamAmex

author: Tata Projects
content: Tata Projects is happy to announce the appointment of Mr. Vinayak Pai as its Chief Executive Officer and Managing Director Designate. With more than three decades of experience in leading engineering companies globally, he has held key positions in Engineering Design, Technology Licensing, Project Management, Business Development, and Operations. He has also worked with diverse-nationality teams in various business areas across EMEA and APAC regions. #TataProjects #TPL
